website_summaries.verdict: A rich, pure castor oil in a large portion that has generated praise for the results it produces. Some concerns about the brand name that suggests it's organic.
pros: Repeat users brag about having thicker hair and eyelashes after using this product
Made with a cold-pressed, triple-refined process
cons: Despite the company name, users gripe that this castor oil is not certified organic
Feels a bit sticky on the skin

customer_reviews.title: The chemo dried my skin out terribly and within two weeks I could see hair growth ...
customer_reviews.text: I have beaten ovarian cancer praise Jesus! I lost most of my hair and was searching for something natural and pure to aid in growing my hair, eylelashes, and eyebrows. The chemo dried my skin out terribly and within two weeks I could see hair growth and my skin has never been so soft and moisturized! Molivera Caster Oil is now my forever staple!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from debilitating hair loss due to imbalanced hormones, Lyme, and a whole ton of other things. I've tried every supplement and shampoo under the sun. While it was due to all internal problems, topical castor oil slowed down the loss significantly and immediately. Wow. I used a concoction of castor oil, coconut oil, coconut milk, and Castille soap. It gave my super thin, damaged, falling-out hair an incredible volume boost and reduced the loss right away. Can't wait to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenaa

customer_reviews.title: I have thick hair since I've used molivera castor oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair since I've used molivera castor oil, my hair has become soft and manageable, loving it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the healing properties of this oil is simply amazing. Now
customer_reviews.text: I started using castor oil for many reasons. I wanted my hair and scalp to remain healthy (I do not have dandruff) and thick. I have also used this on cuts and scrapes, and the healing properties of this oil is simply amazing. Now, when I get very dry skin, or my heals are cracking over the winter chill, I use it and it works immediately. This is not an exaggeration, it works immediately. The volume and packaging of this particular product is impressive. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Slowly but surely!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product says it takes about 6 months to see any results, but after a couple weeks of use, I am already seeing some results!! Love it! I am amazed.
customer_reviews.author: L.Blenker

customer_reviews.title: Old-school medicine, up to speed today with great results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm falling in love with this oil. First of all, I've been using 100% pure lanolin oil for many years. My husband doesn't like the greasiness, but I need grease on my dry skin, sorry! This oil is less greasy than lanolin, but is oily enough to keep my skin smooth at night. I love the texture it gives my skin. I got too much on my hair (thin, fine), but after I washed it out, my hair was very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lompocwoman

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for lash breakage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this Castor oil for only two weeks and already have healthier, longer lashes. There’s also hair growing in spots that have been sparse on my brows for years. The bottle is huge, so for this price it truly is a great value. I’ve also used it a couple times on my scalp around my hairline where I have some skin issues. This instantly helped to moisturize and got rid of the flaking skin. Love this product and will definitely purchase again... if I ever make it through this giant bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Britney K

customer_reviews.title: A versatile product which can be used in multiple applications
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Molivera Caster Oil for a multitude of purposes. It's working beautifully to heal a small wound that was slightly infected. I've been massaging a small amount onto my wet hair after my evening shower. I leave it in overnight and wash it out in the morning. It leaves my hair shiny and healthy looking. I've also been using it as a body moisturizer and patting it around my eyes at bedtime. My skins looks better and I prefer to use products that aren't loaded with chemicals. So far, I am very pleased with the results that I have experienced in less than A week's time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently begun using Molivera Organics Castor Oil, but I notice improvements already. My hair is lustrous and isn't breaking and falling out as much as it had been. I also use it on my skin and it seems softer and smoother. A little goes a long way. It's a bit tacky so I add a carrier oil. Jojoba or grape seed work for me. I'm happy to have this oil since it's doing good things for my hair and skin!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This product is NOT organic
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT organic. The name of the company has organic in it but the product itself is not. In fact, using it made my eyes even more irritated. I am going to try something else
customer_reviews.author: Oakleaf

customer_reviews.title: Surprising results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after researching about natural hair growth remedy. While hair growth is hard to track, I can say for sure that castor oil has helped my hair and my mom's hair become stronger and thicker. Our hair also feel silkier and look shinier. This definitely have commercial conditioners beat. We're almost half way through the bottle and will repurchase once it's all emptied. P/S: this oil is a little thick and stick, so best diluted with a carrier oil for an even spread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff is amazing. Can be used alone or as a carrier oil. I like to mix it with my favorite lotion for easier application. This stuff is thick & rich with nutrients. If you're reading this, you're probably considering Castor Oil. I say, do your skin (or hair) a favor and get one asap. I think you'll be happy with this brand, as I am-- surprisingly lol. Usually, I have to go thru a few different brands before proclaiming my admiration for one product. Enjoy ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Yeah i works wonder like my mom used to tell me
customer_reviews.text: Yeah i works wonder like my mom used to tell me.I cut my fingers & i applied to the cut surely it stopped the bleeding & i even share it to my friend who had ingrown toe she truely was amazed.Thank you my mom is been telling me this i was a kid and i am now in my early 50's i now believed about Castor oil works i starts using it for my hair as how you recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! I use it for my eyelashes and eyebrows ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I use it for my eyelashes and eyebrows which were thinning and the very short. It's like a miracle, my eyelashes are long and thick within a few days. I also use it on my skin now and love the difference it makes. I haven't tried it on my hair but can't wait to try it. I will definitely buy it again. I received it in less time than expected and the company is really great about emailing tips on how to use it. I even got instructions on how to use it as a face mask with honey and I can't wait to try that also. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOUR LOOKING FOR PURE CASTOR OIL
customer_reviews.text: This product is a scam ! It comes in a brown bottle to make you think it's 100 percent castor oil but when you you pour it in you hand it's clear! 100 PERCENT CASTOR OIL IS NOT CLEAR !!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: australia Washington

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I don't doubt there are health benefits but this stuff is too sticky. I switched to Jojoba Oil and it is amazing. This castor oil is like glue, rubbing into scalp pulls hair out. Also, lint, small hair, and anything else sticks to your skin. No good for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Thicker lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this nightly for a few weeks, but I have already started to notice my eyelashes becoming fuller. I haven't noticed any new growth yet. But I've definitely noticed more thickness and density to my existing lashes! Would definitely recommend it for anyone trying to lengthen or thicken existing lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Aliquo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my eyebrows and eyelashes. Both have filled in nicely. My eyelashes were sparse with only a few hairs on the bottom lashes. Now they are full and longer than they have ever been. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted J.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! Great quality! I'm not fond of the smell, but it's not terrible it probably won't bother others. I don't know if it made my lashes grow any faster but it helped grow them back after I lost most of them when I tried eyelash extensions. I also like to use this as a hair mask along with coconut oil a couple times a month. I put it all on my roots, for growth and thickness, and put coconut oil on the ends and put a plastic cap and leave it on for a few hours! Takes a couple days to totally wash out because it is oil... So don't do it the day before a big event!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works - Must Have Patience
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I use it with a spoolie for my eyebrows and it took about 4-5 weeks when I started seeing my sparse spots sprout little hairs. Another couple of weeks and they started to fill in nicely. I then started using vasoline first and then put this on after it with the spoolie and rub it in with the brush to stimulate the follicle. I had less dramatic results with my eyelashes but this with alittle vasoline made them fill in as well. They aren't as sparse as they once were. You must be patient with it and you'll be rewarded.
customer_reviews.author: VSkye

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. Im sure that i will order Molivera produkts ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok i can say just one word...AMAZING.Im sure that i will order Molivera produkts again and again.Usually i order all the time from Amazon but i never leave any feedback (that doesent mean that the produkts that i order are not good)just i dont find any time to write a review.But this produkt is just amazing its so pure .I order the almond oil ,argan oil and castor oil and all three of them are great.Thank you so much Molivera continue to have the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: STAKAKA

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to mix with coconut oil to put in my hair. I put it in once a week on my roots and massage it into my scalp and also at ends of my hair. So I haven't told anybody I started using this and I've been getting compliments that my hair has been looking really healthy. There's so much in the bottle you only need to use a little bit in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: astefers

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair growth and styling
customer_reviews.text: Love my castor oil and this brand! I use it in my hair to moisturize and style, never been a fan of gel so this is a superb replacement. No complaints here, there's so many uses for this one oil. Also promotes eyebrow growth(though mine never needed any additional aid) It still leaves them looking slick and glowing. It takes me about 5 months to go thru one of these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great company!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a frequent Amazon customer who relies on other customer reviews with my purchases. I am really skeptical of cosmetic reviews after hearing that beauty product companies rate their own products to give them a higher rating. Since Castor oil has been around forever I decided to give this one a try. So far, I have not been disappointed. Not only do I love the product but the emails I get with tips and recipes are awesome! Very satisfied with this purchase. Time will tell if my hair really does feel thicker and silky smooth but at this point I feel confident that it will!
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI_01001110

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I had eyelash extensions for a few months and decided I couldn't afford them anymore. I let them fall out naturally but they still left my eyelashes short and thin. I've been applying this to my lashes every night for the past week and have already noticed a difference! I have started to look into all of its other great uses and can't wait to see the positive outcomes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: it was recommended. While I will use it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use on skin and hair....it was recommended. While I will use it, probably on my feet in winter, I found this particular product super thick and hard to get off my hands after I apply it. It's like a liquid Vaseline. Thick, sticky and super water resistant. A little goes a long way!! Not sure if I see any results yet, but I will use it...it's a big bottle! I'll figure out other uses! :)
customer_reviews.author: Thami64

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using Castor Oil and I love it. I put it under my eyes before bed instead of wrinkles cream and on my eyelashes....one a week I do a hair mask with it. I personally like the scent. It's a product that does it all - I have been recommending it to everyone I know. Throw how the expensive lash serums and eye creams and just go for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: But I love the consistency & texture for my skin
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 2 weeks since I have been using this product, so it's too soon for me to give it 5 stars. But I love the consistency & texture for my skin! I bought mostly to help with my hair, but my husband doesn't like the smell. I think if u add essential oils it would solve that problem. Or just wash it out after 30 minutes. It is not a defect of the manufacturer, it's just the plant. I normally use coconut oil on my face, but this is far superior. Would totally recommend it! Still waiting to see if it helps with hair regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Awesome Company!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, received quickly and love the tips & recipes Molivera emails on a regular basis! I will absolutely be ordering again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful of great results...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to increase growth of eyelashes, eyebrows and a thinning patch on my scalp. So far, I am quite pleased with the product and am hoping that it does what everyone claims and I will gain thinker eyelashes, eyebrows and hair with continued use. I love that there's virtually no scent and it seems to soak in well. I will look into other uses for the product as well. I have yet to figure out how to use it on my lashes without getting a bit in my eyes, but I will continue to work on that.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Ive only had it a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy my castor oil. I think it's amazing so far for helping clearing up scars. The ends of my hair likes it as well but not as much as when I use it to clear my skin. The only problem I had was that my bottle wasn't full all the way when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: Great for eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if it promotes hair growth but my eyelashes feel more sturdy and don’t fall as easily. Moisturizes my under eyes as well :) I’ve had it for 1+ years and I still have a lot! Great price
customer_reviews.author: abi

customer_reviews.title: I have eyelashes again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can deal with saggy skin, I can deal with extra weight, I can deal with puffy eyes, but the one thing I just could not deal with, was my eyelashes thinning due to getting older. I don't use this daily, yet my long lashes have filled in and are long again. I really need to do this on my hair, but don't like the greasy hair til the next washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like This Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: I used this Castor Oil in my homemade body butter and it turned out Great. I have been making my own for quite some time and this ingredient made it more moisturizing. I use it in my hair and on my skin. The bottle is huge for the price and I really like the fact that there is a red plug (that is easily removed) inside the bottle to prevent the product from spilling out during shipping. I'm sure the bottle will last me a while, but I would definitely recommend this product and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema and other home remedies!
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad eczema on my legs, like terrible. Lotions and perscriptions cost way to much for me, this can be used for eczema and a ton of other things and it's not expensive! A little bit really goes a long way, but after using for a few days the eczema is already almost cleared up! It's also fantastic for using on your eyelashes to help them grown thicker!
customer_reviews.author: MaylynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Molivera Organics Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: Ok, in the beginning I thought this castor oil is not going to make my lashes grow longer but I've been using this product for weeks now and OMG this is working wonders for my lashes, skin, and I also use this for my hair after I get out the shower when my hair is damp. This product from now on will be part of my regimen. I am giving this 5 stars because it works for multiple things. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: crissy criss

customer_reviews.title: Caster Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is Rip's wife here! Hello all! I absolutely love this Caster Oil! I have just received this bottle the other day, and I tried it on my nails. I am going to keep up with using it and as I go along I will keep you all informed has to how long and how well this works. This may take a while since my finger nails are really bad. They bend, they chip, they crack and split.
customer_reviews.author: RipRap

customer_reviews.title: I believe this will make hair grow everywhere exciting !
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Does exactly what it says. MAKES (atleast my eyebrows) grow. I have only had this product a couple weeks, But I can see the little hairs coming in already.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE HAM

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared-it’s thick.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it ENOUGH to see any improvements with regards to lashes and eyebrows but have had unforeseen circumstances inter fear with my research. Will be back at it In a day or two. Wish it wasn’t soooooo thick but at least it stays put. Trying to get it on your hair when the oil is that thick is a bit much. Maybe short~ short hair would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: gale gillam

customer_reviews.title: Just 4 stars for now...may have to update soon
customer_reviews.text: Just 4 stars for now. I just started using it for my stretch marks (2 pregnancies in 2 years...ugh), and decided to use it on my scalp, eye lashes, and eye brows, as well. I haven't noticed a difference just yey for those areas (it hasn't even been a week), but I will say that my hands have not been dry at all, since I use them to apply the oil. For dry skin, this stuff definately works. For everything else, I'll just have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bambino

customer_reviews.title: I like this oil
customer_reviews.text: Even though I haven't used this oil for very long, I think it is making a difference in the texture of my hair. It was badly damaged from heat. I combined it with coconut oil and added rosemary. I heat it, (just the amount I am using each time), for a minute in the microwave the gently rub on my scalp and the damaged ends.
customer_reviews.author: amabuy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try on my hair; it's too soon to tell if it's thickening it, but I tried it on my face in the meantime and wow, it's the best moisturizer I have found. It's saving my skin this winter and I have had no issues with breakouts. I had a small issue with the top "sweating" oil and as soon as I mentioned it to the company, they were quick to replace the pump. You are safe to try this oil from them; if there's any issue they will take care of you. I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: wisewoman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely excited to give this product a try!
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how good castor oil is for your hair and skin. I have only had this about a week and have done a deep hair condition (which was great) and hope to see a noticeable change in my eyebrows and lashes! Definitely going to put it to the "Winter's in Minnesota" test!
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Lynn Hagen

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my eyelashes have definitely gotten longer and thicker since using this product. I have also been using the product on my eyebrows but I have not seen the same results as much yet as my eyelashes. It just may need more time. I have also been using the product along with a heating pad and wool blanket for abdominal pain. Overall, I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Muffins

customer_reviews.title: I make a Shampoo Bar that uses both Castor Oil and Avocado Oil as super fat. My only disappointment is that I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this Castor Oil in my recipe for milled soap. I make a Shampoo Bar that uses both Castor Oil and Avocado Oil as super fat. My only disappointment is that I paid more for this oil because it was sold as Organic, but then the label on the bottle does not mention that it is organic. So is it organic, or is it not? I like to use organic oils if I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gehrie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my hair for years, it's a great sealing oil for me. I've used it to help me regrow my edges after some postpartum shedding. I've even used it for my lashes. It's a staple for me!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Such a big bottle at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this for cleansing my face with sweet almond oil. So far it’s been great. It brings lots of product so I’m sure it’ll take me a while to run out. I only wish it had a pump but it’s no biggie. I also use it for my lashes as it’ll make them grow.
customer_reviews.author: ACee

customer_reviews.title: need additional containers to make use easier
customer_reviews.text: I just received it recently-it is very messy to use-I need to get to a beauty supply store and get an application bottle (like for hair coloring)-I used it for all over my head conditioning and my hair was greasy and I had to shampoo several times. I have gray hair and it was not in bad shape to begin with. I just want to accelerate my hair growing out.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Brought for lash growth, not a winner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help enhance my eye lash growth prior to my wedding. With consistent use - I don’t see much of a difference. I wish I would have gone with lash tash or a higher end product specific for lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quick and efficient. Had to come back to update. This oil is great!!! My eyelashes are longer and thicker. The top ones at least. A small improvement on the bottoms. I also use this for after I shave a very sensitive are. No razor bumps. I use this any time I'm getting a zit and it helps. I'm loving this. I will buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Oil that can be used in so many different ways
customer_reviews.text: Love this castor oil. It’s pure and don’t smell as strong as others I’ve tried. I initially got this oil to use it on my hair to stop hair loss. It has really help with that. I also use it on my eyebrows and Can’t believe I’m finally growing them back from years of plugging. I also use it as a nail cuticle treatment at nights. My recent discovery has been that when I apply it on my skin it moisturizes my dry skin really well and as a plus it helps heal my ocasional adult acne faster!
customer_reviews.author: NRD

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I ve had the castor oil for 2 weeks or so, like that it came with an extra top that you can press down on so you can control the amount of oil that comes out. I have been using it in my eyelashes. Also use it on my body as soo as i get out of the tub., leaves my skin smoother than a baby's ass. Shipment cames quick and was packaged nicely. Would have given a five but want to see what it will do for lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Molivera Organics Castor Oil 16.0z
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cure my Eczema! Within applying this a few days after the showers it's working! This oil is thick and I think it is great for someone who suffers Eczema! It gets really oily and appears stains through my clothing, but it is all worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail for healthy lashes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! I use it every night on my eyelashes and it helps with growth and length so much! It also works well for moisturizing hair and keeping it healthy
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mascorro

customer_reviews.title: Odorless
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's very thick and at first thought it would be too greasy but surprisingly it absorbs quite a bit and fairly quickly and is very soothing. Remains to be seen if it does any long term improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized bottle and so far, so good on the quality of the product. I was using a pharmacy brand castor oil before trying this (after I read that the quality of the oil can make a difference in the results of oil cleansing) and this seems to be much more pure. You can tell by the smell-- it smells natural and like it is derived from something plant-based, whereas the other castor oil I tried had no smell (it wasn't organic or cold pressed and it made no claims about its purity). The jury is still out on whether the cleanse will be more effective since I've only used it a handful of times. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Best dry skin relief (mixed w/ coconut oil)
customer_reviews.text: At first, I tried using the oil straight, and it was too sticky and gooey. Now I mix roughly equal parts organic coconut oil and Molivera castor oil. Gently warm until melted, and fully integrated and then add a little essential oil (I like peppermint). Now I use it daily on my skin, nails, feet, and weekly as a hair mask. It's still oil, so be careful with clothing. I prefer to use at night. It was a game changer this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing my lashes look way thicker and longer
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing my lashes look way thicker and longer. I use 1/4 castor oil and 3/4 sunflower oil for oil cleansing and am so loving the results. My skin looks mor vibrant and glowy and my fine lines are actually DISAPPEARING after using this only one week
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Golden

customer_reviews.title: Oil is great, the cap/bottle could be redone.
customer_reviews.text: The oil itself is great! The product is good, and doesn't smell bad like some other castor oils. The bottle however is not the best. When it was shipped, it was fine, but after the first use, the oil leaks out of the cap. It is not dented or broken, but somehow the oil comes out of the cap when open (from the bottom of the cap) and leaks all of the bottle. Maybe try a different cap or be aware so that you know the bottle is going to get oily. Would recommend, just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best hair oil for hair growth!!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is seriously the best!! I’ve been using it for two years straight now and I’ve got to say, I have so much hair (quantity and length) now. I actually have a beautiful hair line now, thanks to this oil. I would definitely recommend, if you’re looking for more length, and actually growing more hair on your head. This is it for you. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie r.

customer_reviews.title: Helped with dandruff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally because i was having problem with hair thinning and was hoping this would work. Haven't seen any results but did find that it helps with bad dandruff. Smell isnt the greatest but ive smelt worse.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: lavender oil externally and fish oil internally to treat a horrible eczema rash on my daughter's legs and elbows
customer_reviews.text: I have tried olive oil, coconut oil, calendula oil, lavender oil externally and fish oil internally to treat a horrible eczema rash on my daughter's legs and elbows. Nothing was working, until I tried this castor oil! It is the second day I have applied it nightly to her body, and I am seeing significant improvement...so much so, that I believe she will be recovered in another 2 days! I am sold on this product and have begun recommending it to other eczema sufferers I know.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bolyard

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use in making vole repellant for my garden. I was a bit leery because I wasn't sure such a refined product would work but it really did the job for me! Emulsify with a little sal suds, mix in water and water into your beds. I actually got a crop of onions this year for the first time! Plus this is great for my hair!
customer_reviews.author: M. Verber

customer_reviews.title: Did not have a seal if that matters to you ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a seal if that matters to you.. Also have noticed hair loss and itchiness in areas i applied this. Kind of made my skin have a few small bumps and it still feels itchy in those areas was my experience
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: I've read a lot of literature about castor oil and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of literature about castor oil and how it helps hair and skin. I'm a middle age and have greying, dry hair and my skin is also loosing it's elasticity and oil. I've seen some improvements in my skin and my hair. It's been a slow process, it's not magic but it is improving some. This is the second bottle that I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: doggone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: After my girlfriend told me how much she loved it. I thought I would try it and bought it to boost the growth of my eyelashes I noticed a difference in their thickness after only a few days use. After reading on the bottle that it can be used on my face, I decided to try that and noticed a difference overnight (less redness). Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Great product - delivers what they said it would!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly what they said in the description. It's been wonderful for my skin and for my husbands hair. We can absolutely see a positive difference. We paid more for the cold pressed and organic. If it's works in your budget, it's worth it! I also like that they followed up and emailed me with interesting and helpful information about the product and it's uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love Castro oil it has so many benefits. Don't have smell, very thick so a little goes a long way. You should dilute it with water if using on skin because it is more easy to spread due to being so thick.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Beyond that the smell is alright and it does make the skin nice and soft when applied to it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is THICK. I’m not sure if castor oil is supposed to be this thick but when putting it on my hair it’s hard to not have it make your hair too oily. Beyond that the smell is alright and it does make the skin nice and soft when applied to it. Wish it was thinner but I can’t change that.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne/scarred skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil because it was recommended by a trusted nutritionist to use as a face wash. I mix it with one part castor oil, 3 parts extra virgin olive oil and use it for my face wash every night. I've only had it for a week, but my skin is clearer, smoother, scars are getting lighter, and overall, my skin just looks better. I've read about its amazing benefits for hair too and will try that application next. I bought this specific oil because it is cold-pressed and will continue to purchase when my current bottle runs out. Great product, benefits, and customer service from Molivera Organics.
customer_reviews.author: Julie LB

customer_reviews.title: Don't Have a Title
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving this review "early" because I keep getting emails to do so. At this point, I can't really tell you a lot. Only used it a few days. A friend had told me castor oil smells horrible, but this is lightweight and I don't notice much of a smell. I am not allergic to it, and my skin seems to like it. That's a lot to say for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: More than a Laxative
customer_reviews.text: A YOUTUBE search of applications for castor oil may amaze you as it did me. It expanded my understanding of the multiple useful applications this product has.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sheriff

customer_reviews.title: Molivera Castor oil is the best product i have used so far
customer_reviews.text: During the winter months my skin and hair require extra moisturizing. Molivera Castor oil is the best product i have used so far. I even use it on my son's skin too. This recent bottle was bought for my sister. She needs relief from itchy skin especially during the winter months. I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I've mostly been using it on my face, and it's an awesome moisturizer in dry California air. It doesn't make me break out. Every now and then I rub a little on my scalp too. Maybe it will be good for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Baranyk

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and was exactly what I wanted. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and was exactly what I wanted. I have been using it in my hair since I got it and I have already noticed stronger shinier hair. My hair and scalp really seem to be loving this oil and soaks it right up, and despite its thick texture it never seems to leave my hair greasy or weighed down. I apply it to my scalp every other day, and to my hair any time I restyle. I would definitely repurchase although since a little goes such a long way I probably won't need to for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Calee

customer_reviews.title: Fresh high quality castor oil!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this but so far its so much better than the drugstore type in the brown small bottle. I noticed its really good for dry lips and facial moisturizer. I am using it for my hair as well to thicken some hair loss from different things. Its also thinner than the thick drugstore kind ,which makes it easier to apply . Its nice that its not filled with pesticides and its cold pressed, I would purchase this brand again and look forward to the benefits from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hthorne

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This oil seems like the best I have came across, I would recommend this to anyone in the market for a quality Castor. I bought this after being recommended to this brand ( by a satisfied friend) because like most 30 year old ladies, my eyebrows need some help regaining their natural thickness after too much tweezing in the early 2000s.
customer_reviews.author: lyndii

customer_reviews.title: My husband was using it for a while for his hair because his so called gel or hair Vaseline run out and was using this for a whi
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really tried it for my hair as I wanted too. My husband was using it for a while for his hair because his so called gel or hair Vaseline run out and was using this for a while (not bad at all). Good vs the one they sell at Target. The one at Target is like pure i think straight out Black, thick, and smells bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ladi D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil for about a month now, and I love absolutely everything about it! I use it in my hair, but I also realize that it works wonders on fading dark spots. I had a rash under my breast that left 2 dark spots, I used the oil there every night, and it totally faded by the third week... I was truly amazed. Love it!!! 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Emily  Atkins

customer_reviews.title: I would like to try on my scalp but not sure how ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it for an extended period of time but so far I have put it on my eye brows and it seems to have thicken them. I would like to try on my scalp but not sure how to go about that. Could someone help me on that? Like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a couple of months to write this review. I must say it has proven one of the best oils for my purpose/s. I use it on my scalp as an emollient; as a face moisturizer (small amount with an essential oil); and, as a moistening mixture with other ingredients on my lips. There are no adverse effects as far as I can see. I will definitely purchase this product again. I keep it in the refrigerator and usually use about a teaspoon each morning for my daily moisturizing routine.
customer_reviews.author: juan4253

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so soft I add some to my lotion, I actually have seen a difference in my eyebrows and eyelashes with thickness. I use a little in my hair with some rosemary essential oil, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I hate is the smell
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used the product yet because I was out of town BUT I received it in time. The only thing I hate is the smell. It literally smells like castor oil. I know its castor oil but I was hoping that it would have a really nice smell to it knowing that it will be going in my hair and skin. It also looks rich and when I applied it to my face, I saw an instant glow in my complexion and this was only applied today ONCE. When I use the product more frequently I will give another review.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwy

customer_reviews.title: For scalp and skin health, natural is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stuff, feels natural and good for massage oil. I also use it for my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: a fellow seer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it; its very thick
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it;its very thick, which shows good quality. I think the price was excellent for the big bottle you received. I will be using this oil for hair strength,nails,and on my skin. I have not been disappointed! Thanks!😄
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This big bottle will last a long time I use it on my face, neck and hair (gets rid of itchy scalp). Absorbs and not sticky. My cat loves the smell and taste and will groom my hair for a long time. Very relaxing LOL. Big bottle and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-ard

customer_reviews.title: Takes away pain with no harmful side effects!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my feet are so painful that I am not enjoying life. I can’t take the medication do tors provided me any longer. My digestive system is Ames’s. I am a very active person by nature, so I looked for other alternatives. Four days of the oil on my feet each day and I was able to go on a 10 mike bike ride today. Yahoo! Thank you. You
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Green

customer_reviews.title: I really like this castor oil for my skin and hair and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this castor oil for my skin and hair and no more dandruff. It is thick so it lasts a long time. The tips from Molivera Organics has also been helpful, This is my second purchase and will continue to buy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J.R,

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: I love how my skin is looking after I started to use this oil. I use it as a moisturizer before going to bed and after I wake up in the mornings my face looks younger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I have discovered this company and oil. Excellent product. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer gsm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described...! :)
customer_reviews.text: I had a reconstruction surgery and was worried about scaring. This in combination with using on my scalp which is moistening, strengthening and nourishing hair, reducing scars discoloration in surgery area, makes me so happy that this year I decided to keep it up and buy another bottle. Great Stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good 😊
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this in my hair and on my eyelashes for the past couple weeks and I can definitely say that my eyelashes look a lot longer and fuller. My scalp hairs have grown a little since I’ve been using this too. 👌 I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this morning and night on my face and neck and anywhere my skin is dry, like arms and legs. It absorbs well and does a good job of moisturizing. I use it lightly in my hair and on my hair roots at night. I have been using just a short time but already see improvements in my skin and hair condition. I will order this again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Suse

customer_reviews.title: My fingernails are stronger and are not breaking/splitting like they were
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Castor Oil in my hair and on my skin for about three weeks now. My hair has become thicker, noticeably longer and stronger! My fingernails are stronger and are not breaking/splitting like they were. I love this product and have recommended it to everyone who has asked me about my hair growthand thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Castor oil. It’s organic. It’s Super, man
customer_reviews.text: This is somewhat new territory for me, I tried castor oil before, topical. This type is getting some internal use. I add to capsules and use on skin and find it a great facial treatment.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: My eyelashes look great! Almost like if I had falsies one
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes look great! Almost like if I had falsies on. It took about a month but I wash my face every night to remove my make up and a apply some oil on a tissue and wipe all that mascara and waterproof eyeliner that is left (still after washing my face) and go to sleep. If you keep doing it every day you will see huge results on your eyelashes. Started to do this on my eyebrows and now theyve gotten darker and look fuller!! I'm happy with this product :D
customer_reviews.author: Sheyla Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The product seems to be working fine. It was my fault for rushing into a ...
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be working fine. It was my fault for rushing into a purchase without checking the details like I usually do, but this product is not organic and the brand name is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Epling

customer_reviews.title: Guys, it’s great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Guys, it’s great. I’m serious. It’s just caster oil. I mean if your skeptical like me/down here in the reviews... look a little more and you can’t find an amazing price like this 16 oz freaking bottle. Get it guys, just do it 👍 P.S the key to not having your hair fall out when you put this in, is to not leave it in too long! 1-3 hours at most
customer_reviews.author: John E. Trost

customer_reviews.title: I am using the castor oil mixed with a carrier oil and so far its been great. I'm going to start using the castor oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I started cleansing my face using the OCM (oil cleansing method). I am using the castor oil mixed with a carrier oil and so far its been great. I'm going to start using the castor oil on my scalp next to see if it can help with my hair which is type 2b/2c and very fine and it seems with age it is getting very thin. The company has sent me a couple of emails to make sure I have received the oil and there are not any problems along with a few tips on how to use the oil which I thought was nice. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: r_2hlf

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to others especially for the size and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using Molivera product and I have no complaints. I combine this oil with the Molivera Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil (another brand) and Shea Butter for use on my body and hair. I would recommend this product to others especially for the size and money (more product for $)..
customer_reviews.author: FleeKin

product_meta.title: Molivera Organics Castor Oil 16 oz. Premium Cold Pressed 100% Pure Castor Oil, Best Moisturizer for Skin & Hair, Eyelashes and Hair Growth, Triple Filtered, Great for Acne, UV Resistant BPA Free Bottle
product_meta.description:
DISCOVER THE YOUTHFUL RADIANCE THAT LIES HIDDEN UNDER YOUR SKIN AND HAIR. 
Do not let these common skin and hair issues make you shy away from feeling confident and beautiful: Shedding or Thinning hair, Thin or sparse eyebrows and eyelashes, Bald patches, itchy scalp, dandruff. Dry, dehydrated, frizzy, unruly, or brittle hair. Split ends. Dark patches, blemishes, acne, scars, stretch marks. Wrinkles and fine lines.Stressed, dull, and dry skin. Chapped, cracked lips and heels, nails and cuticles. Eczema, rash, rosacea, psoriasis. 

GREATEST GOLD MINE OF SKIN AND HAIR BEAUTIFICATION CRAMMED IN ONE NATURAL OIL: MOLIVERA ORGANICS 100% PURE CASTOR OIL. 
Our Castor Oil is the highest premium grade available, 100% pure, triple filtered, and is guaranteed the freshest. Unlike other brands, our Castor Oil is cold pressed, meaning it has not gone through the harsh extraction process that overheats and strips the oil of its healing properties. Castor Oil is incredibly healing, because it is loaded with antioxidants, essential fatty acids, and Vitamins- especially Vitamin E. It is a powerful anti-aging agent, as it helps to renew skin cells and increases elasticity. Castor Oil improves blood circulation to the skin, increasing hair growth and youthful radiance glow to your skin. Giving you that thick luscious hair and supple youthful skin you have been looking for.We send you our oil in a UV protective bottle, to keep out damaging light & keep in healing properties. 

DARE TO BE BEAUTIFUL! 
We guarantee you will be 100% in love with your new skin and hair or your money back. 
SO, EMPTY OUT YOUR BEAUTY CABINET, AND ADD MOLIVERA ORGANICS CASTOR OIL TO YOUR CART NOW AND ENJOY BEING IN YOUR OWN SKIN.
feature_bullets: Highest Premium Grade Available. Our 100% Pure Castor Oil is Grade A. Made in small batches to Guarantee 100% freshness.
Unlike other Castor Oils on the market, Molivera Organics Castor Oil is, Cold pressed, Fragrance Free, Hexane Free, Preservative Free, Chemical Free, and 100% Vegan.

Incredible results- Extremely high in Anti-Oxidants, Essential Fatty Acids, and Vitamins (Especially Vitamin E-known for its beautifying properties). Increases blood flow to scalp to encourage thick hair growth and re-growth.

Anti-Aging for soft, supple, elastic skin. Diminishes appearance of fine lines and Wrinkles. Deeply Moisturizing for Glowing, youthful skin. Restructuring and Revitalizing for luscious, soft, touchable, lustrous, and visibly healthy and happy hair.
Highly Trusted Brand. Guaranteed to be 100% amazed with results or money back.
